rooms.description: Vastu compliant entrance with a welcoming design featuring west-facing windows for positive energy flow.
Open living space with floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and ventilation, designed according to Chettinad style aesthetics.
Modern kitchen layout with east facing window for morning sunlight, complementing the overall design, including a small pantry.
Spacious master bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the south side to enhance tranquility and privacy.
Cozy guest room with Vastu principles in mind, ensuring proper ventilation.
Additional guest bedroom designed for comfort and ease of access.

openings.features: Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural light.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance brightness and view.
Grand entrance door with Chettinad architectural detailing.
East facing window providing morning light, complementing Vastu guidelines.
